Name: HELLFRONT: HONEYMOON
About the game: HELLFRONT is a Shared Screen strategy game where quick thinking and sharp reflexes are everything. Build barracks to produce marines and send them by the bucketload to the meat grinder, then build turrets on the front to rapidly break through into enemy territory. Play the campaign Solo or Co-Op or crush your friends in PVP combat with up to four players locally or online with Steam's Play Together feature. Features: Classic RTS gaming condensed into a shared screen format. 1-4 Player Pick-Upâ€™n-Play local matches. You can Hot join at any time! Tight-as-hell PvPvPvP combat. Rapid, intense matches. It never drags! Play multiplayer remotely using Steam's new Play Together feature! Play solo or co-op missions or PVP! Speedrun and compete on the leaderboards! Play with mouse & keyboard or gamepad.
